Unbothered

Rapper Kali On How To Spot A Scammer & The Art Of The Finesse

Is 2022 the summer of the scammer? That’s one of the questions up for review on this episode of Unbothered’s Go Off, Sis podcast. And it’s easy to se
title: Lorde Pulled A Rihanna & BYOBed At The Grammys

meta_data.title: Lorde Flask Matched Her Grammys Dress, Rihanna-Style
meta_data.description: From afar, Lorde's bright red flask almost looks like a shiny evening bag that matched her dress. But, nope: That's definitely a flask.
